titles: Here begynneth a ryght profytable treatyse co[m]pendiously drawen out of many [and] dyuers wrytynges of holy men, to dyspose men to be vertuously occupyed in theyr myndes [and] prayers
author: Betson, Thomas.
notes: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Christian life --  Catholic authors --  Early works to 1800.
